_header: As I find written in a legend aurea
Subjects: Agatha, saint, life of; saints’ lives

BLAru327.First Lines:
As y fynd wrytyn in legend aureaOn fyue wysys may þis wurd
                    Agatha…
BLAru327.Last Lines:
…There euere to abyde wyth god & theSey yche man Amen pur
                    cheryte
BLAru327.Attributed Author:
Translated into englys be a doctor of dyuyinte clepyd Osbern
                    Bokenam…Wrytyn in Cambryge by hys sonn ffrer Thomas Burgh (index, f.
                    193)
BLAru327.Attributed Title:
The prologue of seynt Agas lyf (rubric, f. 151) The lyf of seynt Agas
                    (index, f. 193)
